name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. C.A.K., a Minor, Appellant

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. C.A.K., a Minor, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of February, 2001, this appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Dennis Arthur Alessi, York, for C.A.K.
Craig S. Brooks, Pittsburgh, Mark David Fetterman, West Grove, for the Com. of PA, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
766 A.2d 326
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. C.A.K., a Minor, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 20, 2001.
Dennis Arthur Alessi, York, for C.A.K.
Craig S. Brooks, Pittsburgh, Mark David Fetterman, West Grove, for the Com. of PA, appellee.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
